meta.name: Forest Creative Ltd.
meta.about: A London-based media production and marketing agency providing bespoke services to brands in the UK and Europe for expansion into the Chinese market.
meta.single_line_address: Unit 3 Larch Court, 2 Royal Oak yard,, SE1 3GB London, UK

meta.name: Forest Creative
meta.about: Found by former managing editor of Esquire, we provide all range of media production and marketing consultation especially for Chinese market

meta.name: Forest Creative / Forest Production
meta.about:
Forest Creative comprises an expert team, with years of experience in media and consumer marketing. 

As a powerful group of world-class production specialists, our service ranges from photography, cinematography to 3D animation and all varieties of post-production. We also work closely with many famous photographers and cinematographers in Europe to enhance the creativity of our group.

Our founder, Jack Forest; whose passion for the media industry resulted in his impressive career for the past 20 years, has worked in a number of prestigious Asian establishments, such as TVB, CRHK, and Oriental Daily, when he was also the managing editor of the renowned international men’s magazine, Esquire, and the editorial director of Hong Kong’s leading newspaper, Apple Daily.

With an unrivalled network and fruitful experiences in content creation, Forest Creative is the best media agency and production company in Europe for the Chinese and Hong Kong markets.

address.en: Unit 3 Larch Court, 2 Royal Oak yard, SE1 3GB
